translation.text: NCS train #113, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:01 PM, is on the move and maybe operating 20 to 30 minutes behind schedule due to an earlier vehicle being struck by a train.
SWS inbound and outbound trains may incur a delay up to 15 minutes behind schedule due to an earlier minor Amtrak derailment blocking access to some platforms.
BNSF inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 20 minutes behind schedule due to an earlier minor Amtrak derailment blocking access to some platforms.

UPW train #57 scheduled to arrive Geneva at 6:58 PM, is on the move and operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule, due to an operational incident. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.

MDW inbound and outbound trains may be operating up to 30 minutes behind schedule due to earlier switch problems and a vehicle struck by a train. Please visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.

UPDATE: MDW train #2229 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 4:35 pm, will not operate due to an earlier vehicle struck by a train. Train #2233 will be the next train to accommodate passengers.
SWS train #818, scheduled to depart 179th Street/Orland Park at 1:12 PM, is operating with extensive delays due to an earlier operational incident.
MED Van Buren Station Platform Elevator Out of Service
The Van Buren Station Platform elevator is out of service. Customers can use South Water or Museum Campus/11th St as alternate boarding stations.
NCS train #109, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 4:25 PM, is on the move and maybe operating 20 to 30 minutes behind schedule due to an earlier vehicle being struck by a train.
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
HCD outbound trains may incur delay
HCD outbound trains may incur up to 20 minutes behind schedule due to an earlier minor Amtrak derailment blocking access to some platforms.
BNSF and SWS Customers May Experience Platform Arrival Delays at Chicago Union Station
BNSF and SWS customers may experience platform arrival delays at Chicago Union Station.    A minor Amtrak derailment is blocking access to some platforms.
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
HCD train #919, scheduled to arrive Joliet at 6:36 PM, is operating 15 to 20 minutes behind schedule due to earlier freight train interference.
